tool_description: Verify phone numbers are valid on your apps.
name: Phone Validator API
title: Phone Validator API

api_list.name: Fetch full metadata
api_list.description: This endpoint will return the full metadata of the number included on the request.

api_list.name: Country code number
api_list.description: Returns the digits between the `+` and the national number when the number is written in international format.

api_list.name: Format number
api_list.description: Returns the phone number on standardized formats.

api_list.name: Is fixed?
api_list.description: Returns `true` or `false` depending on whether the number is fixed or not.

api_list.name: Is mobile?
api_list.description: Returns `true` or `false` depending on whether the number is a mobile line or not.

api_list.name: Is possible?
api_list.description: Validates phone number length, returns `true` or `false`.

api_list.name: Is valid?
api_list.description: Validates both phone number length and the actual phone number digits, returns `true` or `false`.

api_list.name: Type
api_list.description: Returns phone number type (`fixed line`, `mobile`, `toll free`, etc); or `undefined` if the number is invalid or if there are no phone number type regular expressions for this country in metadata.

api_list.name: Country ISO 3166
api_list.description: Returns the officially assigned ISO alpha-2 country code, on [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-2).
